OOC: Hey all, I'm back from BotCon2000. And I now have some good
conditioned G1 toys. Could someone tell me what's happened since
Thurseday night, if there are any battles going on now, and what the
hell has Yanshosh done with Hot Rod and DrillBit? There are just to many
posts to read.
